name: Antiquities Core
description: A comprehensive Antiquities-inspired package focused on artifacts, Urza/Mishra themes, assembly-workers, counters, artifact taxation, animate effects, sacrifice-for-value, artifact recursion, and global artifact shenanigans. Includes exotic effects like Tawnos's Coffin–style blink, Triskelion-like counter ping, Tetravus-style counter splitting into tokens, Energy Flux–style upkeep taxes, Titania's Song–style mass animation, Detonate/Crumble lines, Power Artifact–style activation reduction, Transmute Artifact–style upgrading, and Urza land synergies.
